scripts.prepare: mustache configs/${NETWORK}.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache configs/${NETWORK}.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy-thegraph: graph deploy --product hosted-service kybernetwork/kyberswap-elastic-${NETWORK} --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: graph deploy --product hosted-service viet-nv/promm-rinkeby --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy-vietnv: graph deploy --product hosted-service viet-nv/kyberswap-elastic --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy-ropsten: graph deploy --product hosted-service viet-nv/promm-ropsten --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
scripts.deploy-bsc: graph deploy --product hosted-service viet-nv/kyberswap-elastic-matic --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --debug
